subject: Rugby (Game)
lead_paragraph: It wasn't the eight tries scored in the British and Irish Lions' 59-8 victory over the Barbarians that fans or the players will remember, rather it will be Hong Kong's energy-sapping temperature and humidity.
snippet: It wasn't the eight tries scored in the British and Irish Lions' 59-8 victory over the Barbarians that fans or the players will remember, rather it will be Hong Kong's energy-sapping temperature and humidity.
